forward_snippets: We believe the estimates and assumptions are reasonable, and the relative effects of the transaction are properly reflected.
Assets Held for Sale In February 2025, we entered into an agreement to sell our interests in the Ursa and Europa Fields, and Ursa Oil Pipeline Company LLC to Shell Offshore Inc.
and Shell Pipeline Company LP, respectively, for $ 735 million subject to customary closing adjustments.
We believe the estimates and assumptions are reasonable, and the relative effects of the transaction are properly reflected.
Assets Held for Sale In February 2025, we entered into an agreement to sell our interests in the Ursa and Europa Fields, and Ursa Oil Pipeline Company LLC to Shell Offshore Inc.
